name: Sniper-s Vs Deadly Beast-s
description:
It’s almost 2017,with it comes the open hunting season,the perfect season for wild hunters to go into the wilderness for a wild animal hunting adventure.Grab your jungle sniper hunting,load them and go into the wilderness with the best hunter game of the season.This hunting game is not just about deer hunting but this game is also about other wild animal.Do you think you can be the best big game hunter and hunt the biggest and most dangerous animals in the world to be the best safari hunter?
Be a modern animal sniper and gear up with your sniper rifle and let’s hunt.Wildlife animals are dangerous.Sniper 3d shooting skills should be enough to hunt your prey all alone with your sniper rifles.Plan your hunt well and look for head shots.Kill Lion,Deer,Wolf,snake and other wildlife jungle animals.
The game is filled with action,hunting & shooting.Those who love to be a deadly hunter will love to kill deer & the wild lion and other animals.The angry lion is also among us somewhere.Your way don’t hesitate to pull the trigger and shot him dead.It’s wild out there with hunting season of wildlife animals.You will see the most thrilling scenarios in the game.Don’t let the deer run away and be the ultimate hunter.Become the modern sniper of this era using best weaponry.Plan your hunt as if it is a secret assassin mission because this is what real hunters do.
This is an amazing and addictive action game.You are an ultimate adventure in the most realistic environment.Let’s go hunting in the real jungle wilderness environment. The game gives you an awesome experience with real 3D graphics, sound effect and the environment.
Features:
-Real-time Animal Hunting
-Amazing safari hunter and real hunting environment
-Extreme adventure of hunting
-Wildlife safari experience
-Smooth graphics and outstanding control
